dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9461 IH: To extend duty-free treatment provided with respect to imports from Haiti under the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Wenstrup introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To extend duty-free treatment provided with respect to imports from Haiti under the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act.

section.header: Extension of special rules for Haiti under Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act
section.text: Section 213A of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act (19 U.S.C. 2703a) is amended—

clause.text: in subparagraph (B)(v)(I) to read as follows:

item.text: 60 percent or more during the 1-year period beginning on December 20, 2017, and each of the 16 succeeding 1-year periods; and
60 percent of more during the period beginning on December 20, 2034, and ending on September 30, 2035.

subclause.text: in the table, by striking 16 succeeding 1-year periods and inserting 27 succeeding 1-year periods and the period beginning on December 20, 2034, and ending on September 30, 2035; and
in the matter following the table, by striking December 19, 2025 and inserting September 30, 2035; and

clause.text: in subparagraph (A)(ii), by striking ‘‘16 succeeding 1-year periods’’ and inserting ‘‘26 succeeding 1-year periods’’; and
in subparagraph (B)(iii), by striking ‘‘16 succeeding 1-year periods’’ and inserting ‘‘26 succeeding 1-year periods’’; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (h), by striking 2025 and inserting 2035.
